pullrequest.title: Added delete keyboard shortcut for deleting shots and routines.

content.raw:
This code has been in use in the UMD RBLi lab for a few weeks, it had a regression that's now been fixed by an additional commit, and no other obvious bugs have presented themselves.

If there are no objections I will merge it next Monday.

This code has been in use in the UMD RBLi lab for a few weeks, it had a regression that's now been fixed by an additional commit, and no other obvious bugs have presented themselves.
